file_content.text: You're in a service duct over one of the main observation towers. Should find a lift system in there that'll get you deeper inside.
And I'm in. Now, what happens when I pull out this line of code...?
Keep me plugged in for a few, I'll get this.
They've got a rotating cypher algorithm. Miot, give me a hand here.
See if we can't shut this thing up once and for all.
You know the drill: get to the system data center and take EPHEMERIS out. We'll be in touch.
Got a ways to go to reach the EPHEMERIS control center. Better get to it. We're here and listening.
Setting a course for Alderaan. You think I'm stuffy, Miot, you're in for a treat.
Navicom locked on Belsavis. Planetful of convicted psycho killers, here we come.
I don't exactly have clearance on Nar Shaddaa anymore, but... we'll make it work.
Plotting a course to Tatooine. I do not like Tatooine, but I do like saying Tatooine.
Good call. We don't want the Eternal Empire gaining influence over anyone on Voss.
Miot, be sure you got your parka. We're going to Hoth.
Okay, we're going after that sun reactor. I'm with Miot, ready to help in any way we can. Good luck.
Great, you're in. Once you set that reactor to blow, we'll need you to hightail it out of there before we're all, you know--incinerated.
Coming out of hyperspace. Miot, stealth maneuver thirty-six. Get us in nice and close.
All right, Commander, we're here. Get ready to be dropped off.
Eyes on the target. Ready for infiltration when you are.
Star Fortress in sight. Let's get you inside so you can knock them down a peg.
Not sure what's at the heart of this thing. Keep your guard up. I'll be in touch.
Looks like you found a hub of activity. Stay on your toes.
Getting some big power readings from the levels below you. Should look into it.
Must be where all those Skytroopers are coming from. Try not to wake anything up down there.
Hope they don't start mass-producing those things. Great work.
Miot says the power source is just a bit below you. Couple levels, maybe.
Okay, you're in power central now. We need to do something about EPHEMERIS. See if you can patch me into its data cores.
Nice work, Commander. Now we'll bypass that shield and--
Can't get at the shield. Something remote, have to rethink this. Miot, get a lift open!
Shield's down, reactor's dead ahead. Get in there and do what you do best.
Made it this far, just a bit more to go. Few more explosions and we'll have liberated a world.
Be your best friend if you can shut that EPHEMERIS up for good.
EPHEMERIS data cores right ahead, Commander.
Great job, Commander! Now move before that thing blows!
Nice takedown! Get out of there so we can go somewhere less explode-y!
I'll congratulate you soon as we're outside the blast radius. Hope that works for you.
Hopefully, they'll sleep easier tonight planetside. Miot, get ready to haul out of here.
That ought to set them back a good while. Nicely done. Let's blaze a trail.
We hurt them and they know it. More to be done, we'll figure it out.
This isn't over yet. We'll finish it. But right now it's time to get out of here.
Admiral Aygo, you sly Bothan....
Military codebreaker's coming in handy....
That Hylo Visz knows a brilliant slicer or two....
Trying a little something from the seedier side of the HoloNet....
Thank you, Sana-rae....
Slicing codes from a Force user. Multi-talented....
With a tip of the hat to Doctor Oggurobb....
Let's see what our resident Hutt concocted for us....
There you are--beating heart of the whole station. Hope you brought some kind of sun shade.
If you can get around that Exarch we can deal with the stabilizers. After that, be ready to run.
Readings coming out of there are pretty intense. Don't get fried.
If I know you and labs, could be you're about to come across some horribly dangerous experiment.
I'm seeing here the Eternal Empire's placing locals into forced conscription. Not much you can do I guess, thought you should know.
Been getting a look at their armament logs. I know world governments that can't match what they've got in these things.
Looks like their resource harvesting includes the local wildlife. Probably arena fodder.
More of those blasted Skytrooper pods. Arcann loves those things, doesn't he?
Commander, you're breaking up! Losing contact!
Lost you for a minute there, glad you were just unconscious. Looks like they've got you in detention. Going to have to get creative to break out.
You're back! Great! Not that I was panicking. Quiet, Miot.
Good going, Commander.
Every little bit helps....
Nice find. Thinking about keeping it?
You showed them!
Commander--eyes open!
Incoming on your position!
Try not to blow yourself up, too, okay?
Well, if you wanted a sense of the scale of this place... there you go....
Huh. Bet the Alliance can make use of that.
That was close. That was maybe too close.
Think I know someone on Odessen who could use that.
Oh, they didn't see that one coming.
Power spike near your location!
Got it.
I'm in.
There we go.
Connection secured.
No good. Bet Aygo knows some people....
Strange configuration. Maybe Oggurobb can make something of it....
Seen a cipher like this before on the black market....
Out of ideas here. Could use one of Sana-rae's visions about now....
Blast it all.
Shut out. No go.
I swear I'm getting worse at this.
If I'm reading this right, EPHEMERIS beamed its core computing into one of those units. Interesting move--little creepy, but interesting.
Might give us a tactical advantage, actually. Taking it out could disrupt system protocols for a bit.
